steps.name: Before Each Hook
Log out and open the Home page
Open https://staging.prolinker.com/
Log in as recipient user
Click "LOG IN"
Enter email: AQA-CI-pGMvG-750-U-Recip-tMJtb@mailsac.com
Enter password: AQA-CI-pGMvG-750-U-Recip-tMJtb
Click "LOG IN"
Verify that the user is logged
Follow the link from the mail: https://staging.prolinker.com/account/organization/invite?token=48e2ec3a4009223ec7a0ac1ea7c360bec97cb30fua0
Check invitation message
Verify that the message contain AQA-CI-pGMvG-750-U-Send-tMJtb 57079
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-pGMvG-750-U-Send-tMJtb
Click "ACCEPT"
Open https://staging.prolinker.com/account/settings/organization
Verify that the full name of the 0 user is AQA-CI-pGMvG-750-U-Send-tMJtb 57079
Verify that the role of the 0 user is Account holder
Verify that the full name of the 1 user is AQA-CI-pGMvG-750-U-Recip-tMJtb 48990
Verify that the role of the 1 user is Agent
Verify that the pending invitation has disappeared
